channel.title: tracking on Matias Andina
channel.description: Recent content in tracking on Matias Andina

item.title: Fitbit Analysis
item.description: It’s been a bit more than a year since I got a fitbit and I have been pretty excited about tracking my activity and heart rate. I should say I’m quite surprised about the sleep data. Tracking sleep has been, in fact, the most exciting feature, and I now strive to get at least 7 hours of sleep per night. I write fiction and non-fiction. I write open-source software.
